entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Sharbot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:12 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.3°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 08:19 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow at times heavy beginning late this evening. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 08:19 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:19 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
